page.title: 20THE CONTRIBUTORS
page.content: {1. THE WRITTEN TEXT ______________________________________ The information about Dyce was collected and written up by classes 1A and 1B at Dyce Academy as part of their Social Subjects course. It was collected during the months of May and June 1985. The teachers who supervised the work were Val Moir and Rhian Jones. {2. LAND COVER AND AMENITIES SURVEY ______________________________________ This survey was done by Sixth Year Studies Geography classes and supervised by Raymond Jowett and Alison Angus. {3. PHOTOGRAPHS ______________________________________ These were taken by two pupils at Dyce Academy who won a competition organised to find photgraphs for the DOMESDAY PROJECT.
